goal_descEN: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
target_descEN: By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters
indicator_descEN: Direct economic loss attributed to disasters in relation to global gross domestic product (GDP)
seriesDescription: Direct economic loss to cultural heritage damaged or destroyed attributed to disasters (millions of current United States dollars)
unitsDesc: Millions of current United States dollars
footnotes: Disclaimer: the data being submitted by UNDRR has been extracted from two sources: (a) the Sendai Framework Monitoring System as provided by designated national focal points; and (b) Desinventar disaster loss databases. Some of the data has not finalized an official validation process and may be subject to revision at a later date.â. The nature of this data is a combination of C (Country) and E (Estimated).
sources: UNISDR (2019). Sendai Framework Monitor : United Nations Office for Disaster Risk Reduction
